## âš ï¸ Code of Conduct & Fair Play Agreement

**Before submitting this issue, please confirm the following:**

- [ ] I have read the competition rules and guidelines
- [ ] I have checked existing issues to avoid duplicates
- [ ] This issue does NOT contain full or partial code solutions to competition tasks
- [ ] This issue does NOT contain algorithm implementations or solution strategies
- [ ] This issue does NOT request help with solving the competition challenge itself
- [ ] I understand that sharing code solutions violates competition integrity
- [ ] I am only seeking technical support for setup, environment, or tooling issues

**Note:** Issues containing code solutions or algorithm implementations will be immediately closed and may result in disqualification from the competition.
